com.bigdata.search

Class MultiTokenHitCollector<V extends Comparable<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.search.MultiTokenHitCollector<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - The generic type of the document identifier.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHitCollector<V>

    public class MultiTokenHitCollector<V extends Comparable<V>>
extends Object
implements IHitCollector<V>
    Multi-token implementation of IHitCollector backed by a ConcurrentHashMap.
    Author:
    mikepersonick
